title: Ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for use in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama, compatible with Node.js, browsers, and edge runtimes.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style responsive web UI for Ollama with model management, code highlighting, and multimodal support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and streaming support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with simple one-line install and idiomatic Ruby API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama providing Generator and ChatGenerator nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants plus docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM proxy that exposes Ollama models under an OpenAI-compatible endpoint for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-nextjs
summary: Minimal Next.js starter that streams Ollama chat completions using the ollama-js SDK.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate for Ollama with async/tokio support and strong typing.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and persistence options.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+, streaming, and dependency injection.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing and cross-compilation support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama containers for CI testing of LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node that adds Ollama chat and completion actions to no-code workflows.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify integration that registers Ollama models as local LLM providers for prompt orchestration and RAG.
